verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* thou \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* own \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*:

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*: \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w foolish|strong="H5036"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w follow|strong="H0310"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* own \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w nothing|strong="H1115"\w*.

Thy \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w foxes|strong="H7776"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w deserts|strong="H2723"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w gone|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* face \w the|strong="H5921"\w* enemy, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w set|strong="H5975"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w wall|strong="H1447"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H2372"\w* \w vain|strong="H7723"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* foretell \w lies|strong="H3577"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* saith: whereas \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*: \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* persisted \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w confirm|strong="H6965"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*.

\w Have|strong="H0589"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w seen|strong="H2372"\w* \w a|strong="H1696"\w* \w vain|strong="H7723"\w* \w vision|strong="H4236"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H1696"\w* \w lying|strong="H3577"\w* \w divination|strong="H4738"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* saith: whereas \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*: \w Because|strong="H3282"\w* \w you|strong="H3282"\w* \w have|strong="H1696"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w vain|strong="H7723"\w* things, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w have|strong="H1696"\w* \w seen|strong="H2372"\w* \w lies|strong="H3577"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* come \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H3282"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w see|strong="H3045"\w* \w vain|strong="H7723"\w* \w things|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w divine|strong="H7080"\w* \w lies|strong="H3577"\w*: \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w council|strong="H5475"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w writing|strong="H3789"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H3282"\w* \w they|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* deceived \w my|strong="H0559"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*: \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w up|strong="H1129"\w* \w a|strong="H1129"\w* \w wall|strong="H2434"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w they|strong="H0559"\w* daubed \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w with|strong="H2902"\w* dirt \w without|strong="H0369"\w* straw.

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* daub without tempering, \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H0068"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*: \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H0068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w overflowing|strong="H7857"\w* \w shower|strong="H1653"\w*, \w and|strong="H0068"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w cause|strong="H1961"\w* great \w hailstones|strong="H0068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* violently \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w above|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0068"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* stormy \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w throw|strong="H5307"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w down|strong="H5307"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*: \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*: \w Where|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* daubing wherewith \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* daubed \w it|strong="H0834"\w*?

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*: Lo, \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w cause|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* stormy \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w break|strong="H1234"\w* \w forth|strong="H1234"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* indignation, \w and|strong="H0068"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H0068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w overflowing|strong="H7857"\w* \w shower|strong="H1653"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*: \w and|strong="H0068"\w* great \w hailstones|strong="H0068"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* consume.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w break|strong="H2040"\w* \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* daubed \w with|strong="H0413"\w* untempered mortar: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H3045"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w foundation|strong="H3247"\w* thereof \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w laid|strong="H1540"\w* \w bare|strong="H1540"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* thereof: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0853"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w will|strong="H0369"\w* \w accomplish|strong="H3615"\w* \w my|strong="H3615"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* upon \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* upon \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* daub \w it|strong="H2902"\w* \w without|strong="H0369"\w* tempering \w the|strong="H0853"\w* mortar, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w will|strong="H0369"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w you|strong="H0853"\w*: \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w more|strong="H0369"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w they|strong="H0559"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* daub \w it|strong="H2902"\w* \w are|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w more|strong="H0369"\w*.

Even \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H5030"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* see \w visions|strong="H2377"\w* \w of|strong="H5030"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*: \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* thou, \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w set|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w own|strong="H6440"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* do thou \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*: \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w sew|strong="H8609"\w* cushions \w under|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* elbow: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* pillows \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w persons|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* age \w to|strong="H0559"\w* catch \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w when|strong="H2421"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* caught \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w gave|strong="H0559"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3899"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* violated \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w among|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* handful \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w barley|strong="H8184"\w*, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* \w piece|strong="H6595"\w* \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w should|strong="H0413"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w save|strong="H5315"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* \w alive|strong="H2421"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w should|strong="H0413"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, telling \w lies|strong="H3577"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* believe \w lies|strong="H3577"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* declare \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* cushions, wherewith \w you|strong="H0859"\w* catch flying \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*: \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w tear|strong="H7167"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w arms|strong="H2220"\w*: \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* catch, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w should|strong="H0559"\w* fly.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w tear|strong="H7167"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* pillows, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w any|strong="H5750"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w prey|strong="H4686"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H3282"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w lies|strong="H8267"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* \w made|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* mourn, whom \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w made|strong="H2388"\w* sorrowful: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* should \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*.
